metadata.title: CVE-2019-13345 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The cachemgr.cgi web module of Squid through 4.7 has XSS via the user_nameor auth parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13345` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-cgi - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-common - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-purge - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid3 - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squidclient - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7').
